name: Gustav's
description:
Gustav's Is the arcade saloon of a guy called "Gustav", where you  will find 10 original arcade games with their own ticket system and a shop filled with collectables waiting for you to get'em all.

We already have the first 3 machines working!

1. Displated. 2. Duckin' Fair 3. Meteor89

These are fully-functional and the shop of the first one is already playable.

NOTE: The second and third game don't have ticket system or shop yet. What's Next?
Stuff that Gustav's has left: 1. Some setting options. 2. 7 more games.  3. New songs and sounds for each game. 4. A shop window for every game. 5. "HOME"- Home will be a spot to place and have more interactions with the collectable items, for now, we have added a log paper in the "Home" button to let you gamers see what you bought. 6. A coin system to add more stress to every run, one more you play, one less you have left! 7. A claw machine for special collectables. 8. A better and more juicy feeling with sound and particles everywhere!  Also! We are open to read any ideas, problems... You could have!
